overview: Doug May is the Vice President of Sales for ChoiceStream. Doug May brings more than 18 years of sales and management excellence in the high-tech sector to ChoiceStream. Previously, Mr. May served as Vice President of sales for Bit9, Inc., a pioneer and leader in enterprise application whitelisting, where he built a sales team that grew the customer base from 0 to 65 in just two years. Prior to Bit9, he was Director of Sales at Endeca Technologies responsible for the eastern half of North America. There he built and ran the companyâ€™s largest and most successful region helping Endeca to grow from 1 to over 300 customers in under 5 years. Today he leads a sales organization committed to bringing ChoiceStreamâ€™s fully hosted personalization services to market to meet the needs of businesses worldwide.
